title: PROJECT: Fiora
body:
Now i want to start it off with this skin looks freaking amazing the only thing i think would make it better was if some of her hair was over her face/mask and the rest spiked but idk.

also a way bigger thing, HEELS ON A SUPER ADVANCED COMBAT SUIT?!?! really? like why?

EDIT: why all the downvotes I was just giving feedback on my opinion (which is what they ask for)

replies.body:
>Heels

http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120815204305/metalgear/images/6/6b/Tumblr_m8sl44Pa5m1r6hu3go2_1280.jpg
Hi, my name is Raiden and I would like to speak with you.

> [{quoted}](name=Krizalid,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vEkteIGx,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:04:01.582+0000)
>
> http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120815204305/metalgear/images/6/6b/Tumblr_m8sl44Pa5m1r6hu3go2_1280.jpg
> Hi, my name is Raiden and I would like to speak with you.

THis destroyed the argument of this thread. GG
Even more so because he actually catching a knife with his heels XD[](https://youtu.be/ReU-9d32muI?t=1m18s)
Was about to link this.

Hey Da Dwagonswayer,

Thanks for the feedback! 

Just think of her heels as something similar to high-fall boots in Portal - they're stylish yet effective in combat.

The heels look good, but please make her hair look like Fiora. That hairstyle looks like evelyn in this skin. It's weird and not her character, give her the same haircut as all the other fiora skins just with the grey color. Please, I'm really excited about this skin but that ruins it for me : ( and I'm a huge Fiora fan.
you forgot what krizalid mentionned.
one changed about the hair that i am seeing.  I think people would love it if fiora had a pink streak in her hair like her other skins .Its iconic to the character.{{champion:114}}

Shamelessly jumping on a thread I know has red attention - I'm with MasterVidallis up there; her hair currently looks like Evelynn's, which is a style I don't think looks particularly good on Eve, either. I know the hair on the Project skins is roughly supposed to resemble the characters' default looks, and I think short hair would look great on PROJECT: Fiora, but the mini-Super Saiyan hair just doesn't look that great to me. You might try keeping some variation of her current hair-over-her-face look, but something approximately shoulder-length and slicked back might look good as well. Maybe with a hunk of bangs on one side.

Rest of the skin looks solid though.
Long-Fall boots. Great skins though. Just felt I'd chime in with that.

If you have ever seen Metal Gear Solid, the cyborgs there (which are the basis of the project skins) almost all have some sort of heel.

Stop trying to start something.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vEkteIGx,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:47:44.225+0000)
>
> If you have ever seen Metal Gear Solid, the cyborgs there (which are the basis of the project skins) almost all have some sort of heel.
> 
> Stop trying to start something.

I'm not trying to start anything i was just giving feed back, jeez.
Umm... BubbleGum Crisis... because chicks fighting possessed robots in high heels that make 8-bit noises when they step = Win.
Whats wrong with heels on Fiora? It fits her style very well. She's a fencer, not a jump around and crouch type of fighter.

> [{quoted}](name=DaneMac,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vEkteIGx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:01:41.049+0000)
>
> Whats wrong with heels on Fiora? It fits her style very well. She's a fencer, not a jump around and crouch type of fighter.

um... shes jumps a lot tho...

> [{quoted}](name=Da Dwagonswayer,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vEkteIGx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:03:35.809+0000)
>
> um... shes jumps a lot tho...

New fiora jumps a lot?

> [{quoted}](name=DaneMac,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vEkteIGx,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:06:27.404+0000)

> New fiora jumps a lot?

yeah.

> [{quoted}](name=Da Dwagonswayer,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vEkteIGx,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:07:02.472+0000)
>
> yeah.

I'm sorry, but she doesn't she lunges. Big difference.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/champion-update-fiora
So does Raiden from MGR

> HEELS ON A SUPER ADVANCED COMBAT SUIT?!?! really? like why?

Two things: 

1: As others have pointed out, her suit is very similar to Raiden's, and he wears heels too. It just works on that suit.

2: Basic science teaches us that Cyborg chicks with heels, capes, and energy swords are freakin' awesome. It is known.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vEkteIGx,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:19:12.606+0000)
>
> Two things: 
> 
> 1: As others have pointed out, her suit is very similar to Raiden's, and he wears heels too. It just works on that suit.
> 
> 2: Basic science teaches us that Cyborg chicks with heels, capes, and energy swords are freakin' awesome. It is known.

I geuss.
What is there to guess? I stated two facts. Denying either one is on par with declaring the earth a cube.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vEkteIGx,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-08-20T21:42:46.013+0000)
>
> What is there to guess? I stated two facts. Denying either one is on par with declaring the earth a cube.

No i understand, i just think the heels are silly is all.

And you are welcome to your opinion, as long as you recognize that your opinion is wrong.

Hehehe, people and their legs

{{champion:267}}
How the hell does Nami fly? She has no form of propulsion! Why doesn't she slither like Cass? Or just flop around?
wtf. the hells are amazing wtf is wrong with u
